name: ˹ᴛᴜɴᴇ ᴠɪᴀ ʙᴏᴛ˼
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram, Py-TgCalls, and yt-dlp.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: MongoDB URI for storing bot data (get from https://cloud.mongodb.com).

LOGGER_ID.description: Chat ID of the log group where the bot sends logs (bot must be admin).

COOKIE_URL.description: Raw link (e.g., Pastebin or Batbin) to your YouTube cookies.txt file for better yt-dlp performance.

API_URL.description: (Optional) URL of a custom API server used for music downloads or other services.

VIDEO_API_URL.description: (Optional) URL of a custom API server used for video downloads or other services.

API_KEY.description: (Optional) API Key associated with your custom music download server (used with API_URL).

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: (Optional) Heroku API key for auto-deployments or restarts.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: (Optional) Your Heroku app name (used with HEROKU_API_KEY).
